ygData.subject: Re: Anyone on this list besides me?
ygData.msgSnippet: This link has some information on the skill. I ve read it and find it a little lacking and possibly wrong, but it s a good starting point. The books are cheap
ygData.messageBody:
This link has some information on the skill. I've read it and find it a little
lacking and possibly wrong, but it's a good starting point. The books are
cheap so, it's just the 10pp to attempt to make something that's holding me
back.

I'll post when I make my fire Thermal Cloak. :)

-Zikkin


http://everquest.gamestats.com/Skills/Tinkerr.htm

> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
